function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Onset of symptoms of stress and psychiatric disorders affecting the immune system","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting disease due to higher levels of inflammation","Mitigation":"Promote mental health and overall wellbeing through strategies such as creative maintenance of affective and social links","Technologies":"Technological and community-based strategies for social support","People":"Vulnerable populations, elderly persons in nursing homes","Owner":"Experts, community organizations"},{"Description":"Social isolation in nursing homes during confinement","Impact":"Impairing the overall state of the residents' health","Mitigation":"Continuation of safe social activities among the elderly in nursing homes","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Elderly residents in nursing homes","Owner":"Nursing homes, community organizations"},{"Description":"Anxiety caused by overexposure to news","Impact":"Increased anxiety and stress levels in individuals","Mitigation":"Restricting the frequency of news updates, relying on reliable mainstream sources, restricting children's access to news and mobile devices","Technologies":"Social media accounts for reliable information dissemination","People":"General population, children, minors","Owner":"Experts, social media platforms"}]}
